data.name: Free to Play Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official sound track of Free To Play the movie.

Track list:

1. Main Title Sequence 02:40
2. Dota 02:19
3. Fear 00:54
4. hyhy 01:53
5. Off The Friggin' Hook 02:45
6. Your Choice Now 01:12
7. Cologne 01:48
8. EHOME 00:47
9. The Potential to Win 02:53
10. Something We Shared 01:41
11. Get A Real Job 02:35
12. Dota Brother 01:43
13. High Risk Game 01:45
14. Na'Vi vs Scythe 01:22
15. So Close 03:06
16. This is My Hope 01:45
17. Scythe vs EHOME 04:30
18. Dendi and His Dad 04:01
19. EHOME vs Na'Vi 03:11
20. Na'Vi Wins! 01:16
21. Aftermath 02:17
22. Alternate Main Title Sequence 02:40

The Free To Play soundtrack will be downloaded to your computer as MP3 files. You must have Free To Play installed on your computer as well to receive the DLC content.
